page.title: 05EDUCATION & EMPLOYMENT
page.content:
In{Kingsley}there are two schools.One is{Kingsley and Newton {County Primary}and the other is {St.Johns Church of England School. There is a{Nursery}unit in Kingsley County Primary and there are playgroups for the under five year olds.There is a School in Manley and thats called{Manley County Primary {School.}The Design Centre and School Meals Training Centre are for adult education.
There is not a great deal of {employment}in the Kingsley area mostly it is small local industies. Most people travel by car to their place of work.
